divs: Sighting Detailsthis request was taken by Nick Voulgaris CFI Mufon NY for Mufon HQ. The witness does not have email and requested a telephone interview. The witness is 28 years old lives with his mother, unemployed fisherman, and takes medication for bi-polar disorder. He drinks socially and lives in New Bedford 41.6362 - 70.9342. The witness clams to see three bright lights coming from the west observed from Sept. 7 to Sept 11. They appear from dusk to late at night. He also reported to police sometime in Aug. of this year an translucent being on his neighbors roof.
